Gangon:

"coming! i'm coming! i'm not as fast as you!..." he said converting to beast
mode....which was an odd beast mode....half spider and half scorpion....he
was already catching up to her because he was faster in beast mode........
"where are we heading now? Megatron i presuse....that was Hell Beast's
orders so i shall obey them....i am not a back stabber....." he ran into a
tree from his daydreaming.....it reminded him of when he ran into the wall
in Dracona's lair....he then turned his attention to BrightBlade, who he was
right beside now........
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 20, 2000 7:14 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> BrightBlade, Rage
>
> *BrightBlade saw Hell Beast come out of the base and answer Zardus's
calls,
> she shrugged and transformed into her beast mode.
> She looked over her shoulder at Gangon and then started off in the
direction
> that she had last seen Megatron go in.*
>
> " Come on, slow poke! We have to get a drop on Megatron and I want to make
a
> report on him to send back to Hell Beast TONIGHT!"
>
> *With that she began to run off in a northernly direction, Megatron
wouldn't
> be able to escape her!"
>
> ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
>
> * Rage crouched low but her size made it imposable to hide in the field's
> grass, the herbavores never came near enough to snach.
> Rage snarled and sprang to her feet, she snapped at a gazell as it sprang
> away and missed it. She tryed a number of times but she couldn't manage to
> catch a meal for her rumballing stomach!
> Rage then looked up at the structure that sat a fair distance away and
> sighed, perhaps there was easier food there?
> She got down to all fours and began to walk, her chest had begun to hurt
> from the waight of her back and walking on all fours helped ease it. She
> ambled along, looking from left to right as she walked towards the metal
> structure.
> Prehaps supper would be soon?*
